name: lineman-coffee-angular
description: An HTML/JS/CSS Lineman AngularJS application on CoffeeScript
author: Maksim Kostromin

scripts.production: lineman clean build && npm i express@3 && node -e "var e = require('express'), a = e(); a.use(e.static('dist/')); a.listen(process.env.PORT)"
scripts.production8000: lineman clean build && npm i express@3 && node -e "var port = 8000; var e = require('express'), a = e(); a.use(e.static('dist/')); console.log('listening port: ' + port); a.listen(port)"
